TestGroupDocumentation.Title: maxExclusive4 Validate Tree Content tests
TestGroupDocumentation.Description: The tests for checking the on-demand validator of trees got by unmarshalling of a maxExclusive-4.xsd based XML document and created dynamically via ObjectFactory. The schema defines a short restricted SimpleType with maxExclusive value -23419.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML short maxExclusive-4.xsd, validate unmarshalled then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls maxExclusive-4-1.xml document which specifies valid value -32768 for the short restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-short-maxExclusive-4 element, sets the values: -23420, -23450, -32768 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML short maxExclusive-4.xsd, validate unmarshalled then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test unmarshalls maxExclusive-4-1.xml document which specifies valid value -32768 for the short restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-short-maxExclusive-4 element, sets the values: 0, -23419, 32767 and expects validation to fail.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML short maxExclusive-4.xsd validate dynamically created then legally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of short restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-short-maxExclusive-4 type, sets the values: -23420, -23450, -32768 and expects validation to pass.

TestCaseDocumentation.Title: NIST XML short maxExclusive-4.xsd validate dynamically created then illegally changed content tree
TestCaseDocumentation.Description: The test creates an instance of short restricted SimpleType NISTSchema-short-maxExclusive-4 type, sets the values: 0, -23419, 32767 and expects validation to fail.
